output_dir = aligned_reads_SNS2020_Tb927-62_bowtie2
# output directory name (generated by the sript in the working directory)

input_list = ("10_S61_" "16_S67_" "18_S69_" "20_S71_")           
# list of sample names as found in the fastq files e.g. $sample\L001_R1_001.fastq.gz

fastq_directory = fastq_SNS_control                         
# path to fastq directory

genome =  genome/TriTrypDB-62_TbruceiTREU927_Genome/index_bowtie2/TriTrypDB-62_TbruceiTREU927_Genome    
# path and genome prefix of bowtie2 index and genome.fasta

genome_prefix = Tb927-62  
# genome prefix for filenames of mapped reads

readname_postfix_R2 = L002_R2_001.fastq.gz
